description: Explore how Arbitrum, a Layer 2 scaling solution designed by Offchain Labs, is addressing Ethereum's network congestion challenges. Learn about Optimistic Rollups, its advantages for decentralized application scalability, and how it supports the Ethereum ecosystem's growth.
keywords: Arbitrum, network congestion, Layer 2 solutions, Ethereum, scalability, decentralized applications, Optimistic Rollups, blockchain, gas costs, Ethereum 2.0
title: Arbitrum and Network Congestion: Navigating the Future of Scalable Decentralized Applications
